Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-3447 affecting package qemu for versions less than 6.2.0-24
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-3447 affecting package qemu for versions less than 6.2.0-24. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package qemu is earlier than 6.2.0-24, affected by CVE-2024-3447
